Posts.EditableText:
Thought I'd share a little function I wrote called [url=http://sites.google.com/site/queststuff/string-replace:1ythnkn9]StringReplace[/url:1ythnkn9].

It allows you to replace sub-strings of a string with another sub-string.
Posts.HTML:
Thought I'd share a little function I wrote called StringReplace.

It allows you to replace sub-strings of a string with another sub-string.
